snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the web, including Legos depicting a model of an Apple computer from the 1980s, and a debacle on blocking users at Twitter.
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the web, including Legos depicting a model of an Apple computer from the 1980s, and a debacle on blocking users at Twitter.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Lego Stop-Motion of an Old Mac, and Twitter's Male-Dominated Flub
